description: King Zora Farkos De Bon XVI.
tooltip: Select King Zora Farkos De Bon XVI as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: King De Bon focuses on improving the Dominion's Cavalry units.
Allows you to summon King Debon, a mounted Siege hero.
Huge Cavalry unit that can be upgraded to carry various smaller units.
All units cost 5% less to produce.
Improves the speed of all Hydrophant Cavalry units.
